notes: Full-screen doesn't work properly and there are some minor performance issues.

title: Peggle Deluxe
notes: You have to not be in fullscreen mode when the game starts. The way I did it was to edit the user.reg file located in .../SteamLibrary/steamapps/compatdata/3480/pfx (Peggle Deluxe is Steam ID 3480). You can just edit this file in a text editor. Search for Peggle and then change  ScreenMode to be 00000000 instead of 00000001 i.e.   "ScreenMode"=dword:00000000  The game will then run no problem even with Hardware Acceleration enabled.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Sandybridge Desktop x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Played until halfway adventure mode. No issues whatsoever.
title: Peggle Deluxe

notes: Low fps solved by deactivating the 3D acceleration in the game menu.
title: Peggle Deluxe

notes: Runs in software mode only due to NVIDIA ION GPU being incompatible with Vulkan enabled NVIDIA drivers. May work with hardware acceleration on other systems with supported video cards. Custom cursor is very slow. Using Alt+Tab or the Super key causes Unity 7 to black screen. Otherwise the game is perfectly playable using all modes with 100% performance in full screen and window mode on a 2010 Intel Atom CPU. Given the above, there are no graphical or audio issues.
title: Peggle Deluxe

notes: 40fps with 3d accel, 100fps without (ingame setting).  Audio sounds... off - like it's missing 10% of the instruments.
